message.body: Hey! I'm going to be leaving in a few. Would you book me to pick you up on the way to Sam's?
I'm actually not going to be able to make it!!! So sirry. My mom wanted to go shopping and then food shopping. I told her I'd go whenever she wanted and she wanted to go today. I couldn't say no.
Buuuut, if you're free tomorrow night, I was asking sam too, if you wanted to go to tiffin
Oh not a problem! There are plenty of brunches that is to come for us :) which mall are you going to???
Awww I don't think I can make it tomorrow night :( but I want to try that famous butter chicken one of these days!!!
Awww! We aren't going to the mall, just like...target and old navy and some other stores around there.
